cs.DM, cs.LO, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of synchronization of automata, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and theoretical computer science (cs.LO). The use of random inputs suggests a connection to information theory (cs.IT) and stochastic systems (cs.SY). Finally, the mention of the Cerny automata, which are a well-known example in automata theory, suggests a possible connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning.
